diff_hunk:

   """Reset file that contains customized config settings."""
   open(_TF_BAZELRC, 'w').close()

body: I don't understand that. You mean I can just do checkout, call bazel build //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package and this is expected to give a fully functional TF?
